title: Handmaiden's Mace
content:
Mace 1.8 480

Handmaiden's Mace

1d6+2Bludgeoning+1d6Poison

Weapon Enchantment +2

Set the wearer's Strength to 18. The enchantment has no effect if their Strength score is higher without it.

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

This mace was designed by Lolth's assassins to fell heretics who dared turn their back on the Spider Queen. However, even the best-laid designs fall to nothingness when brought to bear against Shar's faithful.

Handmaiden's Mace is one of the Simple Melee Weapo
